amendment.description: To strike the provision giving entities in southern border States priority in the award of grants related to the identification and processing of unidentified remains.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2685 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2685 proposed by Senator Cornyn. (consideration: CR S6714; text: CR S6714) To strike the provision giving entities in southern border States priority in the award of grants related to the identification and processing of unidentified remains.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2685 proposed by Senator Cornyn.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2685 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
